title: Ziti with Roasted Zucchini and Garlic

Ingredients.1: 2 pounds zucchini, cut into 1/4-inch thick rounds

Ingredients.6: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).

Directions.2: Toss zucchini, shallots, 5 tablespoons oil, garlic, and crushed red pepper in a bowl until coated. Spread on rimmed baking sheets and sprinkle with salt and pepper.

Directions.3: Roast vegetables in the preheated oven, turning occasionally, until tender, about 30 minutes.

Directions.4: While vegetables are roasting, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook ziti pasta at a boil, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, 9 to 12 minutes. Drain, reserving 3/4 cup cooking water.

Directions.5: Toss cooked pasta with 1 tablespoon oil. Transfer to a large pot. Add roasted vegetables, 1/4 cup cooking water, and remaining 1 tablespoon oil; stir over medium heat until heated through. Add 3/4 cup basil and Parmesan cheese. Toss, adding remaining cooking water, 1 tablespoon at a time, if dry. Season with salt and pepper. Serve with remaining basil sprinkled on top.
